				add_modifier = { modifier = custom_difficulty_MM_mod_country_starbase_capacity_mult_15 days = -1 }

				add_modifier = { modifier = custom_difficulty_MM_mod_country_starbase_capacity_mult_20 days = -1 }
			}
		}
		 #first copy a backup of the old value, then take new value and update with randomnessfactor. If old value is different from new, update modifiers
		set_variable = { which = custom_difficulty_tmp value = custom_difficulty_MM_mod_terraforming_cost_mult }
		set_variable = { which = custom_difficulty_MM_mod_terraforming_cost_mult value = event_target:custom_difficulty_MM_var_storage }
		multiply_variable = { which = custom_difficulty_MM_mod_terraforming_cost_mult value = custom_difficulty_randomness_factor }
		if = {
			limit = {
				NOT = {
					check_variable = { which = custom_difficulty_MM_mod_terraforming_cost_mult value = custom_difficulty_tmp }
				}
			}
			remove_modifier = custom_difficulty_MM_mod_terraforming_cost_mult_-10
			remove_modifier = custom_difficulty_MM_mod_terraforming_cost_mult_-9
			remove_modifier = custom_difficulty_MM_mod_terraforming_cost_mult_-8

			remove_modifier = custom_difficulty_MM_mod_terraforming_cost_mult_-4
			remove_modifier = custom_difficulty_MM_mod_terraforming_cost_mult_-3

			remove_modifier = custom_difficulty_MM_mod_terraforming_cost_mult_11
			remove_modifier = custom_difficulty_MM_mod_terraforming_cost_mult_12
			remove_modifier = custom_difficulty_MM_mod_terraforming_cost_mult_13
			remove_modifier = custom_difficulty_MM_mod_terraforming_cost_mult_14

			remove_modifier = custom_difficulty_MM_mod_terraforming_cost_mult_18
			remove_modifier = custom_difficulty_MM_mod_terraforming_cost_mult_19
			remove_modifier = custom_difficulty_MM_mod_terraforming_cost_mult_20
			if = {
				limit = {
					check_variable = { which = custom_difficulty_MM_mod_terraforming_cost_mult value = 0 }
				}
			}
			else_if = {
				limit = {
					check_variable = { which = custom_difficulty_MM_mod_terraforming_cost_mult value > 95.000 }

			}
		}
		 #first copy a backup of the old value, then take new value and update with randomnessfactor. If old value is different from new, update modifiers
		set_variable = { which = custom_difficulty_tmp value = custom_difficulty_MM_mod_country_command_limit_mult }
		set_variable = { which = custom_difficulty_MM_mod_country_command_limit_mult value = event_target:custom_difficulty_MM_var_storage }
		multiply_variable = { which = custom_difficulty_MM_mod_country_command_limit_mult value = custom_difficulty_randomness_factor }

			limit = {
				NOT = {

				}
				add_modifier = { modifier = custom_difficulty_MM_mod_megastructure_build_speed_mult_14 days = -1 }

				add_modifier = { modifier = custom_difficulty_MM_mod_megastructure_build_speed_mult_20 days = -1 }
			}
		}
		 #first copy a backup of the old value, then take new value and update with randomnessfactor. If old value is different from new, update modifiers
		set_variable = { which = custom_difficulty_tmp value = custom_difficulty_MM_mod_starbase_upgrade_cost_mult }
		set_variable = { which = custom_difficulty_MM_mod_starbase_upgrade_cost_mult value = event_target:custom_difficulty_MM_var_storage }
		multiply_variable = { which = custom_difficulty_MM_mod_starbase_upgrade_cost_mult value = custom_difficulty_randomness_factor }
		if = {
			limit = {
				NOT = {
					check_variable = { which = custom_difficulty_MM_mod_starbase_upgrade_cost_mult value = custom_difficulty_tmp }
				}
			}
			remove_modifier = custom_difficulty_MM_mod_starbase_upgrade_cost_mult_-10
			remove_modifier = custom_difficulty_MM_mod_starbase_upgrade_cost_mult_-9

			remove_modifier = custom_difficulty_MM_mod_starbase_upgrade_cost_mult_-6
			remove_modifier = custom_difficulty_MM_mod_starbase_upgrade_cost_mult_-5

			remove_modifier = custom_difficulty_MM_mod_starbase_upgrade_cost_mult_11
			remove_modifier = custom_difficulty_MM_mod_starbase_upgrade_cost_mult_12

			remove_modifier = custom_difficulty_MM_mod_starbase_upgrade_cost_mult_20

				limit = {
					check_variable = { which = custom_difficulty_MM_mod_starbase_upgrade_cost_mult value = 0 }
				}
			}
			else_if = {
				limit = {
					check_variable = { which = custom_difficulty_MM_mod_starbase_upgrade_cost_mult value > 95.000 }

			remove_modifier = custom_difficulty_MM_mod_edicts_cost_mult_-9

			if = {
				limit = {
					check_variable = { which = custom_difficulty_MM_mod_edicts_cost_mult value = 0 }
				}
			}
			else_if = {

				}
			}
			remove_modifier = custom_difficulty_MM_mod_leader_upkeep_empire_size_mult_-10
			remove_modifier = custom_difficulty_MM_mod_leader_upkeep_empire_size_mult_-9
			remove_modifier = custom_difficulty_MM_mod_leader_upkeep_empire_size_mult_-8
			remove_modifier = custom_difficulty_MM_mod_leader_upkeep_empire_size_mult_-7

		 #first copy a backup of the old value, then take new value and update with randomnessfactor. If old value is different from new, update modifiers
		set_variable = { which = custom_difficulty_tmp value = custom_difficulty_MM_mod_edict_length_mult }

		multiply_variable = { which = custom_difficulty_MM_mod_edict_length_mult value = custom_difficulty_randomness_factor }

		set_variable = { which = custom_difficulty_tmp value = custom_difficulty_MM_mod_country_trust_growth }
		set_variable = { which = custom_difficulty_MM_mod_country_trust_growth value = event_target:custom_difficulty_MM_var_storage }
		multiply_variable = { which = custom_difficulty_MM_mod_country_trust_growth value = custom_difficulty_randomness_factor }
		if = {
			limit = {
				NOT = {
					check_variable = { which = custom_difficulty_MM_mod_country_trust_growth value = custom_difficulty_tmp }
				}
			}

					check_variable = { which = custom_difficulty_MM_mod_trade_value_mult value < -65.000 }

				add_modifier = { modifier = custom_difficulty_MM_mod_trade_value_mult_-7 days = -1 }
			}
			else_if = {

					check_variable = { which = custom_difficulty_MM_mod_trade_value_mult value < -55.000 }

				add_modifier = { modifier = custom_difficulty_MM_mod_trade_value_mult_-6 days = -1 }

			else_if = {
				limit = {
					check_variable = { which = custom_difficulty_MM_mod_trade_value_mult value < -15.000 }
				}
				add_modifier = { modifier = custom_difficulty_MM_mod_trade_value_mult_-2 days = -1 }
			}
			else_if = {
				limit = {
					check_variable = { which = custom_difficulty_MM_mod_trade_value_mult value < -5.000 }
				}
				add_modifier = { modifier = custom_difficulty_MM_mod_trade_value_mult_-1 days = -1 }
			}
			else_if = {
				limit = {
					check_variable = { which = custom_difficulty_MM_mod_trade_value_mult value < 15.000 }
				}
				add_modifier = { modifier = custom_difficulty_MM_mod_trade_value_mult_1 days = -1 }
			}
			else_if = {
				limit = {

				add_modifier = { modifier = custom_difficulty_MM_mod_trade_value_mult_6 days = -1 }

			else_if = {

				add_modifier = { modifier = custom_difficulty_MM_mod_trade_value_mult_7 days = -1 }

			else_if = {
				limit = {

				add_modifier = { modifier = custom_difficulty_MM_mod_trade_value_mult_12 days = -1 }
			}
			else_if = {
				limit = {
					check_variable = { which = custom_difficulty_MM_mod_trade_value_mult value < 135.000 }
				}
				add_modifier = { modifier = custom_difficulty_MM_mod_trade_value_mult_13 days = -1 }
			}
			else_if = {
				limit = {

				}
				add_modifier = { modifier = custom_difficulty_MM_mod_trade_value_mult_14 days = -1 }
			}
			else_if = {
				limit = {
					check_variable = { which = custom_difficulty_MM_mod_trade_value_mult value < 155.000 }
				}
				add_modifier = { modifier = custom_difficulty_MM_mod_trade_value_mult_15 days = -1 }
			}
			else_if = {
				limit = {
					check_variable = { which = custom_difficulty_MM_mod_trade_value_mult value < 165.000 }
				}
				add_modifier = { modifier = custom_difficulty_MM_mod_trade_value_mult_16 days = -1 }
			}
			else_if = {
				limit = {
					check_variable = { which = custom_difficulty_MM_mod_trade_value_mult value < 175.000 }
				}
				add_modifier = { modifier = custom_difficulty_MM_mod_trade_value_mult_17 days = -1 }
			}
			else_if = {
				limit = {
					check_variable = { which = custom_difficulty_MM_mod_trade_value_mult value < 185.000 }
				}
				add_modifier = { modifier = custom_difficulty_MM_mod_trade_value_mult_18 days = -1 }
			}
			else_if = {
				limit = {
					check_variable = { which = custom_difficulty_MM_mod_trade_value_mult value < 195.000 }
				}
				add_modifier = { modifier = custom_difficulty_MM_mod_trade_value_mult_19 days = -1 }
			}
			else_if = {
				limit = {
					check_variable = { which = custom_difficulty_MM_mod_trade_value_mult value < 205.000 }
				}
				add_modifier = { modifier = custom_difficulty_MM_mod_trade_value_mult_20 days = -1 }
			}
		}
		 #first copy a backup of the old value, then take new value and update with randomnessfactor. If old value is different from new, update modifiers
		set_variable = { which = custom_difficulty_tmp value = custom_difficulty_MM_mod_piracy_growth_mult }
		set_variable = { which = custom_difficulty_MM_mod_piracy_growth_mult value = event_target:custom_difficulty_MM_var_storage }
		multiply_variable = { which = custom_difficulty_MM_mod_piracy_growth_mult value = custom_difficulty_randomness_factor }
		if = {
			limit = {
				NOT = {
					check_variable = { which = custom_difficulty_MM_mod_piracy_growth_mult value = custom_difficulty_tmp }
				}
			}
			remove_modifier = custom_difficulty_MM_mod_piracy_growth_mult_-10
			remove_modifier = custom_difficulty_MM_mod_piracy_growth_mult_-9
			remove_modifier = custom_difficulty_MM_mod_piracy_growth_mult_-8
			remove_modifier = custom_difficulty_MM_mod_piracy_growth_mult_-7
			remove_modifier = custom_difficulty_MM_mod_piracy_growth_mult_-6
			remove_modifier = custom_difficulty_MM_mod_piracy_growth_mult_-5
			remove_modifier = custom_difficulty_MM_mod_piracy_growth_mult_-4
			remove_modifier = custom_difficulty_MM_mod_piracy_growth_mult_-3
			remove_modifier = custom_difficulty_MM_mod_piracy_growth_mult_-2
			remove_modifier = custom_difficulty_MM_mod_piracy_growth_mult_-1
			remove_modifier = custom_difficulty_MM_mod_piracy_growth_mult_1
			remove_modifier = custom_difficulty_MM_mod_piracy_growth_mult_2
			remove_modifier = custom_difficulty_MM_mod_piracy_growth_mult_3
			remove_modifier = custom_difficulty_MM_mod_piracy_growth_mult_4
			remove_modifier = custom_difficulty_MM_mod_piracy_growth_mult_5
			remove_modifier = custom_difficulty_MM_mod_piracy_growth_mult_6
			remove_modifier = custom_difficulty_MM_mod_piracy_growth_mult_7
			remove_modifier = custom_difficulty_MM_mod_piracy_growth_mult_8
			remove_modifier = custom_difficulty_MM_mod_piracy_growth_mult_9
			remove_modifier = custom_difficulty_MM_mod_piracy_growth_mult_10
			remove_modifier = custom_difficulty_MM_mod_piracy_growth_mult_11
			remove_modifier = custom_difficulty_MM_mod_piracy_growth_mult_12
			remove_modifier = custom_difficulty_MM_mod_piracy_growth_mult_13
			remove_modifier = custom_difficulty_MM_mod_piracy_growth_mult_14
			remove_modifier = custom_difficulty_MM_mod_piracy_growth_mult_15
			remove_modifier = custom_difficulty_MM_mod_piracy_growth_mult_16
			remove_modifier = custom_difficulty_MM_mod_piracy_growth_mult_17
			remove_modifier = custom_difficulty_MM_mod_piracy_growth_mult_18
			remove_modifier = custom_difficulty_MM_mod_piracy_growth_mult_19
			remove_modifier = custom_difficulty_MM_mod_piracy_growth_mult_20
			if = {
				limit = {
					check_variable = { which = custom_difficulty_MM_mod_piracy_growth_mult value = 0 }
				}
			}
			else_if = {
				limit = {
					check_variable = { which = custom_difficulty_MM_mod_piracy_growth_mult value < -95.000 }
				}
				add_modifier = { modifier = custom_difficulty_MM_mod_piracy_growth_mult_-10 days = -1 }
			}
			else_if = {
				limit = {
					check_variable = { which = custom_difficulty_MM_mod_piracy_growth_mult value < -85.000 }
				}
				add_modifier = { modifier = custom_difficulty_MM_mod_piracy_growth_mult_-9 days = -1 }
			}
			else_if = {
				limit = {
					check_variable = { which = custom_difficulty_MM_mod_piracy_growth_mult value < -75.000 }
				}
				add_modifier = { modifier = custom_difficulty_MM_mod_piracy_growth_mult_-8 days = -1 }
			}
			else_if = {
				limit = {
					check_variable = { which = custom_difficulty_MM_mod_piracy_growth_mult value < -65.000 }
				}
				add_modifier = { modifier = custom_difficulty_MM_mod_piracy_growth_mult_-7 days = -1 }
			}
			else_if = {
				limit = {
					check_variable = { which = custom_difficulty_MM_mod_piracy_growth_mult value < -55.000 }
				}
				add_modifier = { modifier = custom_difficulty_MM_mod_piracy_growth_mult_-6 days = -1 }
			}
			else_if = {
				limit = {
					check_variable = { which = custom_difficulty_MM_mod_piracy_growth_mult value < -45.000 }
				}
				add_modifier = { modifier = custom_difficulty_MM_mod_piracy_growth_mult_-5 days = -1 }

			}
			else_if = {
				limit = {
					check_variable = { which = custom_difficulty_MM_mod_piracy_growth_mult value < -25.000 }
				}
				add_modifier = { modifier = custom_difficulty_MM_mod_piracy_growth_mult_-3 days = -1 }
			}
			else_if = {
				limit = {
					check_variable = { which = custom_difficulty_MM_mod_piracy_growth_mult value < -15.000 }
				}
				add_modifier = { modifier = custom_difficulty_MM_mod_piracy_growth_mult_-2 days = -1 }
			}
			else_if = {
				limit = {
					check_variable = { which = custom_difficulty_MM_mod_piracy_growth_mult value < -5.000 }
				}
				add_modifier = { modifier = custom_difficulty_MM_mod_piracy_growth_mult_-1 days = -1 }
			}
			else_if = {
				limit = {
					check_variable = { which = custom_difficulty_MM_mod_piracy_growth_mult value < 15.000 }
				}
				add_modifier = { modifier = custom_difficulty_MM_mod_piracy_growth_mult_1 days = -1 }
			}
			else_if = {
				limit = {
					check_variable = { which = custom_difficulty_MM_mod_piracy_growth_mult value < 25.000 }
				}
				add_modifier = { modifier = custom_difficulty_MM_mod_piracy_growth_mult_2 days = -1 }
			}

				limit = {

				add_modifier = { modifier = custom_difficulty_MM_mod_piracy_growth_mult_9 days = -1 }
			}
			else_if = {
				limit = {
					check_variable = { which = custom_difficulty_MM_mod_piracy_growth_mult value < 105.000 }
				}
				add_modifier = { modifier = custom_difficulty_MM_mod_piracy_growth_mult_10 days = -1 }
			}
			else_if = {
				limit = {
					check_variable = { which = custom_difficulty_MM_mod_piracy_growth_mult value < 115.000 }
				}
				add_modifier = { modifier = custom_difficulty_MM_mod_piracy_growth_mult_11 days = -1 }
			}
			else_if = {
				limit = {
					check_variable = { which = custom_difficulty_MM_mod_piracy_growth_mult value < 125.000 }
				}
				add_modifier = { modifier = custom_difficulty_MM_mod_piracy_growth_mult_12 days = -1 }
			}
			else_if = {
				limit = {
					check_variable = { which = custom_difficulty_MM_mod_piracy_growth_mult value < 135.000 }
				}
				add_modifier = { modifier = custom_difficulty_MM_mod_piracy_growth_mult_13 days = -1 }
			}
			else_if = {
				limit = {
					check_variable = { which = custom_difficulty_MM_mod_piracy_growth_mult value < 145.000 }
				}
				add_modifier = { modifier = custom_difficulty_MM_mod_piracy_growth_mult_14 days = -1 }
			}
			else_if = {
				limit = {
					check_variable = { which = custom_difficulty_MM_mod_piracy_growth_mult value < 155.000 }
				}
				add_modifier = { modifier = custom_difficulty_MM_mod_piracy_growth_mult_15 days = -1 }
			}
			else_if = {
				limit = {
					check_variable = { which = custom_difficulty_MM_mod_piracy_growth_mult value < 165.000 }
				}
				add_modifier = { modifier = custom_difficulty_MM_mod_piracy_growth_mult_16 days = -1 }
			}
			else_if = {
				limit = {
					check_variable = { which = custom_difficulty_MM_mod_piracy_growth_mult value < 175.000 }
				}
				add_modifier = { modifier = custom_difficulty_MM_mod_piracy_growth_mult_17 days = -1 }
			}
			else_if = {
				limit = {
					check_variable = { which = custom_difficulty_MM_mod_piracy_growth_mult value < 185.000 }
				}
				add_modifier = { modifier = custom_difficulty_MM_mod_piracy_growth_mult_18 days = -1 }
			}
			else_if = {
				limit = {
					check_variable = { which = custom_difficulty_MM_mod_piracy_growth_mult value < 195.000 }
				}
				add_modifier = { modifier = custom_difficulty_MM_mod_piracy_growth_mult_19 days = -1 }
			}
			else_if = {
				limit = {
					check_variable = { which = custom_difficulty_MM_mod_piracy_growth_mult value < 205.000 }
				}
				add_modifier = { modifier = custom_difficulty_MM_mod_piracy_growth_mult_20 days = -1 }
			}
		}
		 #first copy a backup of the old value, then take new value and update with randomnessfactor. If old value is different from new, update modifiers
		set_variable = { which = custom_difficulty_tmp value = custom_difficulty_MM_mod_piracy_suppression_mult }
		set_variable = { which = custom_difficulty_MM_mod_piracy_suppression_mult value = event_target:custom_difficulty_MM_var_storage }
		multiply_variable = { which = custom_difficulty_MM_mod_piracy_suppression_mult value = custom_difficulty_randomness_factor }
		if = {
			limit = {
				NOT = {
					check_variable = { which = custom_difficulty_MM_mod_piracy_suppression_mult value = custom_difficulty_tmp }
				}
			}
			remove_modifier = custom_difficulty_MM_mod_piracy_suppression_mult_-10
			remove_modifier = custom_difficulty_MM_mod_piracy_suppression_mult_-9
			remove_modifier = custom_difficulty_MM_mod_piracy_suppression_mult_-8
			remove_modifier = custom_difficulty_MM_mod_piracy_suppression_mult_-7
			remove_modifier = custom_difficulty_MM_mod_piracy_suppression_mult_-6
			remove_modifier = custom_difficulty_MM_mod_piracy_suppression_mult_-5
			remove_modifier = custom_difficulty_MM_mod_piracy_suppression_mult_-4
			remove_modifier = custom_difficulty_MM_mod_piracy_suppression_mult_-3
			remove_modifier = custom_difficulty_MM_mod_piracy_suppression_mult_-2
			remove_modifier = custom_difficulty_MM_mod_piracy_suppression_mult_-1
			remove_modifier = custom_difficulty_MM_mod_piracy_suppression_mult_1
			remove_modifier = custom_difficulty_MM_mod_piracy_suppression_mult_2
			remove_modifier = custom_difficulty_MM_mod_piracy_suppression_mult_3
			remove_modifier = custom_difficulty_MM_mod_piracy_suppression_mult_4
			remove_modifier = custom_difficulty_MM_mod_piracy_suppression_mult_5
			remove_modifier = custom_difficulty_MM_mod_piracy_suppression_mult_6
			remove_modifier = custom_difficulty_MM_mod_piracy_suppression_mult_7
			remove_modifier = custom_difficulty_MM_mod_piracy_suppression_mult_8
			remove_modifier = custom_difficulty_MM_mod_piracy_suppression_mult_9
			remove_modifier = custom_difficulty_MM_mod_piracy_suppression_mult_10
			remove_modifier = custom_difficulty_MM_mod_piracy_suppression_mult_11
			remove_modifier = custom_difficulty_MM_mod_piracy_suppression_mult_12
			remove_modifier = custom_difficulty_MM_mod_piracy_suppression_mult_13
			remove_modifier = custom_difficulty_MM_mod_piracy_suppression_mult_14
			remove_modifier = custom_difficulty_MM_mod_piracy_suppression_mult_15
			remove_modifier = custom_difficulty_MM_mod_piracy_suppression_mult_16
			remove_modifier = custom_difficulty_MM_mod_piracy_suppression_mult_17
			remove_modifier = custom_difficulty_MM_mod_piracy_suppression_mult_18
			remove_modifier = custom_difficulty_MM_mod_piracy_suppression_mult_19
			remove_modifier = custom_difficulty_MM_mod_piracy_suppression_mult_20
			if = {
				limit = {
					check_variable = { which = custom_difficulty_MM_mod_piracy_suppression_mult value = 0 }
				}
			}
			else_if = {
				limit = {
					check_variable = { which = custom_difficulty_MM_mod_piracy_suppression_mult value < -95.000 }
				}
				add_modifier = { modifier = custom_difficulty_MM_mod_piracy_suppression_mult_-10 days = -1 }
			}
			else_if = {
				limit = {
					check_variable = { which = custom_difficulty_MM_mod_piracy_suppression_mult value < -85.000 }
				}
				add_modifier = { modifier = custom_difficulty_MM_mod_piracy_suppression_mult_-9 days = -1 }
			}

				limit = {
					check_variable = { which = custom_difficulty_MM_mod_piracy_suppression_mult value < -75.000 }

				add_modifier = { modifier = custom_difficulty_MM_mod_piracy_suppression_mult_-8 days = -1 }
			}
			else_if = {
				limit = {
					check_variable = { which = custom_difficulty_MM_mod_piracy_suppression_mult value < -65.000 }
				}
				add_modifier = { modifier = custom_difficulty_MM_mod_piracy_suppression_mult_-7 days = -1 }

				limit = {

				add_modifier = { modifier = custom_difficulty_MM_mod_piracy_suppression_mult_-6 days = -1 }

		 #first copy a backup of the old value, then take new value and update with randomnessfactor. If old value is different from new, update modifiers
		set_variable = { which = custom_difficulty_tmp value = custom_difficulty_MM_mod_branch_office_value_mult }
		set_variable = { which = custom_difficulty_MM_mod_branch_office_value_mult value = event_target:custom_difficulty_MM_var_storage }

		set_variable = { which = custom_difficulty_tmp value = custom_difficulty_MM_mod_num_tech_alternatives_add }
		set_variable = { which = custom_difficulty_MM_mod_num_tech_alternatives_add value = event_target:custom_difficulty_MM_var_storage }
		multiply_variable = { which = custom_difficulty_MM_mod_num_tech_alternatives_add value = custom_difficulty_randomness_factor }

			limit = {

					check_variable = { which = custom_difficulty_MM_mod_num_tech_alternatives_add value = custom_difficulty_tmp }

			remove_modifier = custom_difficulty_MM_mod_deposit_blockers_cost_mult_-7
			remove_modifier = custom_difficulty_MM_mod_deposit_blockers_cost_mult_-6
			remove_modifier = custom_difficulty_MM_mod_deposit_blockers_cost_mult_-5
			remove_modifier = custom_difficulty_MM_mod_deposit_blockers_cost_mult_-4
			remove_modifier = custom_difficulty_MM_mod_deposit_blockers_cost_mult_-3
			remove_modifier = custom_difficulty_MM_mod_deposit_blockers_cost_mult_-2
			remove_modifier = custom_difficulty_MM_mod_deposit_blockers_cost_mult_-1
			remove_modifier = custom_difficulty_MM_mod_deposit_blockers_cost_mult_1
			remove_modifier = custom_difficulty_MM_mod_deposit_blockers_cost_mult_2
			remove_modifier = custom_difficulty_MM_mod_deposit_blockers_cost_mult_3
			remove_modifier = custom_difficulty_MM_mod_deposit_blockers_cost_mult_4
			remove_modifier = custom_difficulty_MM_mod_deposit_blockers_cost_mult_5
			remove_modifier = custom_difficulty_MM_mod_deposit_blockers_cost_mult_6

			remove_modifier = custom_difficulty_MM_mod_deposit_blockers_cost_mult_19
			remove_modifier = custom_difficulty_MM_mod_deposit_blockers_cost_mult_20
			if = {
				limit = {
					check_variable = { which = custom_difficulty_MM_mod_deposit_blockers_cost_mult value = 0 }
				}
			}
			else_if = {
				limit = {
					check_variable = { which = custom_difficulty_MM_mod_deposit_blockers_cost_mult value > 95.000 }
				}
				add_modifier = { modifier = custom_difficulty_MM_mod_deposit_blockers_cost_mult_-10 days = -1 }
			}
			else_if = {
				limit = {
					check_variable = { which = custom_difficulty_MM_mod_deposit_blockers_cost_mult value > 85.000 }

				add_modifier = { modifier = custom_difficulty_MM_mod_deposit_blockers_cost_mult_-9 days = -1 }

			else_if = {
				limit = {
					check_variable = { which = custom_difficulty_MM_mod_deposit_blockers_cost_mult value > -205.000 }
				}
				add_modifier = { modifier = custom_difficulty_MM_mod_deposit_blockers_cost_mult_20 days = -1 }
			}
		}
		 #first copy a backup of the old value, then take new value and update with randomnessfactor. If old value is different from new, update modifiers
		set_variable = { which = custom_difficulty_tmp value = custom_difficulty_MM_mod_planet_crime_mult }
		set_variable = { which = custom_difficulty_MM_mod_planet_crime_mult value = event_target:custom_difficulty_MM_var_storage }
		multiply_variable = { which = custom_difficulty_MM_mod_planet_crime_mult value = custom_difficulty_randomness_factor }
		if = {
			limit = {
				NOT = {
					check_variable = { which = custom_difficulty_MM_mod_planet_crime_mult value = custom_difficulty_tmp }
				}
			}
			remove_modifier = custom_difficulty_MM_mod_planet_crime_mult_-20
			remove_modifier = custom_difficulty_MM_mod_planet_crime_mult_-19
			remove_modifier = custom_difficulty_MM_mod_planet_crime_mult_-18
			remove_modifier = custom_difficulty_MM_mod_planet_crime_mult_-17
			remove_modifier = custom_difficulty_MM_mod_planet_crime_mult_-16

			remove_modifier = custom_difficulty_MM_mod_planet_crime_mult_-13
			remove_modifier = custom_difficulty_MM_mod_planet_crime_mult_-12

			remove_modifier = custom_difficulty_MM_mod_planet_crime_mult_-10
			remove_modifier = custom_difficulty_MM_mod_planet_crime_mult_-9
			remove_modifier = custom_difficulty_MM_mod_planet_crime_mult_-8
			remove_modifier = custom_difficulty_MM_mod_planet_crime_mult_-7
			remove_modifier = custom_difficulty_MM_mod_planet_crime_mult_-6
			remove_modifier = custom_difficulty_MM_mod_planet_crime_mult_-5
			remove_modifier = custom_difficulty_MM_mod_planet_crime_mult_-4
			remove_modifier = custom_difficulty_MM_mod_planet_crime_mult_-3
			remove_modifier = custom_difficulty_MM_mod_planet_crime_mult_-2
			remove_modifier = custom_difficulty_MM_mod_planet_crime_mult_-1
			remove_modifier = custom_difficulty_MM_mod_planet_crime_mult_1
			remove_modifier = custom_difficulty_MM_mod_planet_crime_mult_2
			remove_modifier = custom_difficulty_MM_mod_planet_crime_mult_3
			remove_modifier = custom_difficulty_MM_mod_planet_crime_mult_4
			remove_modifier = custom_difficulty_MM_mod_planet_crime_mult_5
			remove_modifier = custom_difficulty_MM_mod_planet_crime_mult_6
			remove_modifier = custom_difficulty_MM_mod_planet_crime_mult_7
			remove_modifier = custom_difficulty_MM_mod_planet_crime_mult_8
			remove_modifier = custom_difficulty_MM_mod_planet_crime_mult_9
			remove_modifier = custom_difficulty_MM_mod_planet_crime_mult_10

				limit = {
					check_variable = { which = custom_difficulty_MM_mod_planet_crime_mult value = 0 }

					check_variable = { which = custom_difficulty_MM_mod_planet_crime_mult value > 195.000 }

		set_variable = { which = custom_difficulty_tmp value = custom_difficulty_MM_mod_planet_crime_add }
		set_variable = { which = custom_difficulty_MM_mod_planet_crime_add value = event_target:custom_difficulty_MM_var_storage }

			remove_modifier = custom_difficulty_MM_mod_planet_crime_add_-20
			remove_modifier = custom_difficulty_MM_mod_planet_crime_add_-19
			remove_modifier = custom_difficulty_MM_mod_planet_crime_add_-18
			remove_modifier = custom_difficulty_MM_mod_planet_crime_add_-17
			remove_modifier = custom_difficulty_MM_mod_planet_crime_add_-16

			}

		 #first copy a backup of the old value, then take new value and update with randomnessfactor. If old value is different from new, update modifiers
		set_variable = { which = custom_difficulty_tmp value = custom_difficulty_MM_mod_ship_evasion_mult }
		set_variable = { which = custom_difficulty_MM_mod_ship_evasion_mult value = event_target:custom_difficulty_MM_var_storage }
		multiply_variable = { which = custom_difficulty_MM_mod_ship_evasion_mult value = custom_difficulty_randomness_factor }

		 #first copy a backup of the old value, then take new value and update with randomnessfactor. If old value is different from new, update modifiers
		set_variable = { which = custom_difficulty_tmp value = custom_difficulty_MM_mod_ship_tracking_mult }
		set_variable = { which = custom_difficulty_MM_mod_ship_tracking_mult value = event_target:custom_difficulty_MM_var_storage }
		multiply_variable = { which = custom_difficulty_MM_mod_ship_tracking_mult value = custom_difficulty_randomness_factor }
		if = {
			limit = {
				NOT = {
					check_variable = { which = custom_difficulty_MM_mod_ship_tracking_mult value = custom_difficulty_tmp }
				}
			}
			remove_modifier = custom_difficulty_MM_mod_ship_tracking_mult_-10

		 #first copy a backup of the old value, then take new value and update with randomnessfactor. If old value is different from new, update modifiers
		set_variable = { which = custom_difficulty_tmp value = custom_difficulty_MM_mod_ship_experience_gain_mult }
		set_variable = { which = custom_difficulty_MM_mod_ship_experience_gain_mult value = event_target:custom_difficulty_MM_var_storage }
		multiply_variable = { which = custom_difficulty_MM_mod_ship_experience_gain_mult value = custom_difficulty_randomness_factor }

			limit = {

		 #first copy a backup of the old value, then take new value and update with randomnessfactor. If old value is different from new, update modifiers
		set_variable = { which = custom_difficulty_tmp value = custom_difficulty_MM_mod_shipclass_military_station_hull_mult }

		set_variable = { which = custom_difficulty_tmp value = custom_difficulty_MM_mod_ship_sensor_range_add }

					check_variable = { which = custom_difficulty_MM_mod_ship_orbital_bombardment_mult value < -5.000 }
				}
				add_modifier = { modifier = custom_difficulty_MM_mod_ship_orbital_bombardment_mult_-1 days = -1 }
			}
			else_if = {
				limit = {
					check_variable = { which = custom_difficulty_MM_mod_ship_orbital_bombardment_mult value < 15.000 }
				}
				add_modifier = { modifier = custom_difficulty_MM_mod_ship_orbital_bombardment_mult_1 days = -1 }
			}
			else_if = {
				limit = {
					check_variable = { which = custom_difficulty_MM_mod_ship_orbital_bombardment_mult value < 25.000 }
				}
				add_modifier = { modifier = custom_difficulty_MM_mod_ship_orbital_bombardment_mult_2 days = -1 }
			}
			else_if = {
				limit = {
					check_variable = { which = custom_difficulty_MM_mod_ship_orbital_bombardment_mult value < 35.000 }
				}
				add_modifier = { modifier = custom_difficulty_MM_mod_ship_orbital_bombardment_mult_3 days = -1 }

			else_if = {

			else_if = {
				limit = {

				limit = {
					check_variable = { which = custom_difficulty_MM_mod_ship_orbital_bombardment_mult value < 185.000 }
				}
				add_modifier = { modifier = custom_difficulty_MM_mod_ship_orbital_bombardment_mult_18 days = -1 }

				limit = {
					check_variable = { which = custom_difficulty_MM_mod_ship_orbital_bombardment_mult value < 195.000 }
				}
				add_modifier = { modifier = custom_difficulty_MM_mod_ship_orbital_bombardment_mult_19 days = -1 }
			}
			else_if = {
				limit = {
					check_variable = { which = custom_difficulty_MM_mod_ship_orbital_bombardment_mult value < 205.000 }
				}
				add_modifier = { modifier = custom_difficulty_MM_mod_ship_orbital_bombardment_mult_20 days = -1 }
			}
		}
		 #first copy a backup of the old value, then take new value and update with randomnessfactor. If old value is different from new, update modifiers
		set_variable = { which = custom_difficulty_tmp value = custom_difficulty_MM_mod_ship_windup_mult }
		set_variable = { which = custom_difficulty_MM_mod_ship_windup_mult value = event_target:custom_difficulty_MM_var_storage }
		multiply_variable = { which = custom_difficulty_MM_mod_ship_windup_mult value = custom_difficulty_randomness_factor }
		if = {
			limit = {
				NOT = {
					check_variable = { which = custom_difficulty_MM_mod_ship_windup_mult value = custom_difficulty_tmp }
				}
			}
			remove_modifier = custom_difficulty_MM_mod_ship_windup_mult_-10
			remove_modifier = custom_difficulty_MM_mod_ship_windup_mult_-9
			remove_modifier = custom_difficulty_MM_mod_ship_windup_mult_-8
			remove_modifier = custom_difficulty_MM_mod_ship_windup_mult_-7
			remove_modifier = custom_difficulty_MM_mod_ship_windup_mult_-6
			remove_modifier = custom_difficulty_MM_mod_ship_windup_mult_-5
			remove_modifier = custom_difficulty_MM_mod_ship_windup_mult_-4
			remove_modifier = custom_difficulty_MM_mod_ship_windup_mult_-3
			remove_modifier = custom_difficulty_MM_mod_ship_windup_mult_-2
			remove_modifier = custom_difficulty_MM_mod_ship_windup_mult_-1
			remove_modifier = custom_difficulty_MM_mod_ship_windup_mult_1
			remove_modifier = custom_difficulty_MM_mod_ship_windup_mult_2
			remove_modifier = custom_difficulty_MM_mod_ship_windup_mult_3
			remove_modifier = custom_difficulty_MM_mod_ship_windup_mult_4
			remove_modifier = custom_difficulty_MM_mod_ship_windup_mult_5
			remove_modifier = custom_difficulty_MM_mod_ship_windup_mult_6
			remove_modifier = custom_difficulty_MM_mod_ship_windup_mult_7
			remove_modifier = custom_difficulty_MM_mod_ship_windup_mult_8
			remove_modifier = custom_difficulty_MM_mod_ship_windup_mult_9
			remove_modifier = custom_difficulty_MM_mod_ship_windup_mult_10
			remove_modifier = custom_difficulty_MM_mod_ship_windup_mult_11
			remove_modifier = custom_difficulty_MM_mod_ship_windup_mult_12
			remove_modifier = custom_difficulty_MM_mod_ship_windup_mult_13
			remove_modifier = custom_difficulty_MM_mod_ship_windup_mult_14
			remove_modifier = custom_difficulty_MM_mod_ship_windup_mult_15
			remove_modifier = custom_difficulty_MM_mod_ship_windup_mult_16
			remove_modifier = custom_difficulty_MM_mod_ship_windup_mult_17
			remove_modifier = custom_difficulty_MM_mod_ship_windup_mult_18
			remove_modifier = custom_difficulty_MM_mod_ship_windup_mult_19
			remove_modifier = custom_difficulty_MM_mod_ship_windup_mult_20
			if = {
				limit = {
					check_variable = { which = custom_difficulty_MM_mod_ship_windup_mult value = 0 }
				}
			}
			else_if = {
				limit = {
					check_variable = { which = custom_difficulty_MM_mod_ship_windup_mult value < -95.000 }
				}
				add_modifier = { modifier = custom_difficulty_MM_mod_ship_windup_mult_-10 days = -1 }
			}
			else_if = {
				limit = {
					check_variable = { which = custom_difficulty_MM_mod_ship_windup_mult value < -85.000 }
				}
				add_modifier = { modifier = custom_difficulty_MM_mod_ship_windup_mult_-9 days = -1 }
			}
			else_if = {
				limit = {
					check_variable = { which = custom_difficulty_MM_mod_ship_windup_mult value < -75.000 }
				}
				add_modifier = { modifier = custom_difficulty_MM_mod_ship_windup_mult_-8 days = -1 }
			}
			else_if = {
				limit = {
					check_variable = { which = custom_difficulty_MM_mod_ship_windup_mult value < -65.000 }
				}
				add_modifier = { modifier = custom_difficulty_MM_mod_ship_windup_mult_-7 days = -1 }
			}
			else_if = {
				limit = {
					check_variable = { which = custom_difficulty_MM_mod_ship_windup_mult value < -55.000 }

				add_modifier = { modifier = custom_difficulty_MM_mod_ship_windup_mult_-2 days = -1 }
			}
			else_if = {
				limit = {
					check_variable = { which = custom_difficulty_MM_mod_ship_windup_mult value < -5.000 }

				add_modifier = { modifier = custom_difficulty_MM_mod_ship_windup_mult_20 days = -1 }
			}
		}

				add_modifier = { modifier = custom_difficulty_MM_mod_ship_winddown_mult_3 days = -1 }

			}
		}
		 #first copy a backup of the old value, then take new value and update with randomnessfactor. If old value is different from new, update modifiers
		set_variable = { which = custom_difficulty_tmp value = custom_difficulty_MM_mod_ship_interstellar_speed_mult }
		set_variable = { which = custom_difficulty_MM_mod_ship_interstellar_speed_mult value = event_target:custom_difficulty_MM_var_storage }
		multiply_variable = { which = custom_difficulty_MM_mod_ship_interstellar_speed_mult value = custom_difficulty_randomness_factor }
		if = {
			limit = {
				NOT = {
					check_variable = { which = custom_difficulty_MM_mod_ship_interstellar_speed_mult value = custom_difficulty_tmp }
				}
			}
			remove_modifier = custom_difficulty_MM_mod_ship_interstellar_speed_mult_-10
			remove_modifier = custom_difficulty_MM_mod_ship_interstellar_speed_mult_-9
			remove_modifier = custom_difficulty_MM_mod_ship_interstellar_speed_mult_-8
			remove_modifier = custom_difficulty_MM_mod_ship_interstellar_speed_mult_-7
			remove_modifier = custom_difficulty_MM_mod_ship_interstellar_speed_mult_-6
			remove_modifier = custom_difficulty_MM_mod_ship_interstellar_speed_mult_-5
			remove_modifier = custom_difficulty_MM_mod_ship_interstellar_speed_mult_-4
			remove_modifier = custom_difficulty_MM_mod_ship_interstellar_speed_mult_-3

			remove_modifier = custom_difficulty_MM_mod_ship_interstellar_speed_mult_1

			remove_modifier = custom_difficulty_MM_mod_ship_interstellar_speed_mult_3
			remove_modifier = custom_difficulty_MM_mod_ship_interstellar_speed_mult_4

			remove_modifier = custom_difficulty_MM_mod_ship_interstellar_speed_mult_7
			remove_modifier = custom_difficulty_MM_mod_ship_interstellar_speed_mult_8
			remove_modifier = custom_difficulty_MM_mod_ship_interstellar_speed_mult_9
			remove_modifier = custom_difficulty_MM_mod_ship_interstellar_speed_mult_10
			remove_modifier = custom_difficulty_MM_mod_ship_interstellar_speed_mult_11
			remove_modifier = custom_difficulty_MM_mod_ship_interstellar_speed_mult_12
			remove_modifier = custom_difficulty_MM_mod_ship_interstellar_speed_mult_13
			remove_modifier = custom_difficulty_MM_mod_ship_interstellar_speed_mult_14
			remove_modifier = custom_difficulty_MM_mod_ship_interstellar_speed_mult_15
			remove_modifier = custom_difficulty_MM_mod_ship_interstellar_speed_mult_16
			remove_modifier = custom_difficulty_MM_mod_ship_interstellar_speed_mult_17
			remove_modifier = custom_difficulty_MM_mod_ship_interstellar_speed_mult_18
			remove_modifier = custom_difficulty_MM_mod_ship_interstellar_speed_mult_19
			remove_modifier = custom_difficulty_MM_mod_ship_interstellar_speed_mult_20
			if = {
				limit = {
					check_variable = { which = custom_difficulty_MM_mod_ship_interstellar_speed_mult value = 0 }
				}
			}
			else_if = {
				limit = {
					check_variable = { which = custom_difficulty_MM_mod_ship_interstellar_speed_mult value < -95.000 }
				}
				add_modifier = { modifier = custom_difficulty_MM_mod_ship_interstellar_speed_mult_-10 days = -1 }

			}

			limit = {
				NOT = {
					check_variable = { which = custom_difficulty_MM_mod_ship_piracy_suppression_mult value = custom_difficulty_tmp }
				}
			}

			remove_modifier = custom_difficulty_MM_mod_ship_piracy_suppression_mult_-9

			remove_modifier = custom_difficulty_MM_mod_ship_piracy_suppression_mult_-7

		set_variable = { which = custom_difficulty_tmp value = custom_difficulty_MM_mod_ship_anomaly_research_speed_mult }

				add_modifier = { modifier = custom_difficulty_MM_mod_ship_anomaly_generation_chance_mult_-2 days = -1 }
			}
			else_if = {
				limit = {
					check_variable = { which = custom_difficulty_MM_mod_ship_anomaly_generation_chance_mult value < -5.000 }
				}
				add_modifier = { modifier = custom_difficulty_MM_mod_ship_anomaly_generation_chance_mult_-1 days = -1 }
			}
			else_if = {
				limit = {
					check_variable = { which = custom_difficulty_MM_mod_ship_anomaly_generation_chance_mult value < 15.000 }
				}
				add_modifier = { modifier = custom_difficulty_MM_mod_ship_anomaly_generation_chance_mult_1 days = -1 }
			}
			else_if = {
				limit = {
					check_variable = { which = custom_difficulty_MM_mod_ship_anomaly_generation_chance_mult value < 25.000 }
				}
				add_modifier = { modifier = custom_difficulty_MM_mod_ship_anomaly_generation_chance_mult_2 days = -1 }
			}
			else_if = {
				limit = {
					check_variable = { which = custom_difficulty_MM_mod_ship_anomaly_generation_chance_mult value < 35.000 }
				}
				add_modifier = { modifier = custom_difficulty_MM_mod_ship_anomaly_generation_chance_mult_3 days = -1 }
			}
			else_if = {
				limit = {
					check_variable = { which = custom_difficulty_MM_mod_ship_anomaly_generation_chance_mult value < 45.000 }
				}
				add_modifier = { modifier = custom_difficulty_MM_mod_ship_anomaly_generation_chance_mult_4 days = -1 }

				}
				add_modifier = { modifier = custom_difficulty_MM_mod_ship_anomaly_generation_chance_mult_17 days = -1 }
			}
			else_if = {
				limit = {
					check_variable = { which = custom_difficulty_MM_mod_ship_anomaly_generation_chance_mult value < 185.000 }
				}
				add_modifier = { modifier = custom_difficulty_MM_mod_ship_anomaly_generation_chance_mult_18 days = -1 }
			}
			else_if = {
				limit = {
					check_variable = { which = custom_difficulty_MM_mod_ship_anomaly_generation_chance_mult value < 195.000 }
				}
				add_modifier = { modifier = custom_difficulty_MM_mod_ship_anomaly_generation_chance_mult_19 days = -1 }
			}
			else_if = {
				limit = {
					check_variable = { which = custom_difficulty_MM_mod_ship_anomaly_generation_chance_mult value < 205.000 }
				}
				add_modifier = { modifier = custom_difficulty_MM_mod_ship_anomaly_generation_chance_mult_20 days = -1 }
			}
		}
		 #first copy a backup of the old value, then take new value and update with randomnessfactor. If old value is different from new, update modifiers
		set_variable = { which = custom_difficulty_tmp value = custom_difficulty_MM_mod_science_ship_survey_speed }
		set_variable = { which = custom_difficulty_MM_mod_science_ship_survey_speed value = event_target:custom_difficulty_MM_var_storage }
		multiply_variable = { which = custom_difficulty_MM_mod_science_ship_survey_speed value = custom_difficulty_randomness_factor }
		if = {
			limit = {
				NOT = {
					check_variable = { which = custom_difficulty_MM_mod_science_ship_survey_speed value = custom_difficulty_tmp }
				}
			}
			remove_modifier = custom_difficulty_MM_mod_science_ship_survey_speed_-10
			remove_modifier = custom_difficulty_MM_mod_science_ship_survey_speed_-9
			remove_modifier = custom_difficulty_MM_mod_science_ship_survey_speed_-8

			remove_modifier = custom_difficulty_MM_mod_science_ship_survey_speed_-6
			remove_modifier = custom_difficulty_MM_mod_science_ship_survey_speed_-5
			remove_modifier = custom_difficulty_MM_mod_science_ship_survey_speed_-4
			remove_modifier = custom_difficulty_MM_mod_science_ship_survey_speed_-3
			remove_modifier = custom_difficulty_MM_mod_science_ship_survey_speed_-2
			remove_modifier = custom_difficulty_MM_mod_science_ship_survey_speed_-1
			remove_modifier = custom_difficulty_MM_mod_science_ship_survey_speed_1
			remove_modifier = custom_difficulty_MM_mod_science_ship_survey_speed_2
			remove_modifier = custom_difficulty_MM_mod_science_ship_survey_speed_3
			remove_modifier = custom_difficulty_MM_mod_science_ship_survey_speed_4
			remove_modifier = custom_difficulty_MM_mod_science_ship_survey_speed_5
			remove_modifier = custom_difficulty_MM_mod_science_ship_survey_speed_6
			remove_modifier = custom_difficulty_MM_mod_science_ship_survey_speed_7
			remove_modifier = custom_difficulty_MM_mod_science_ship_survey_speed_8
			remove_modifier = custom_difficulty_MM_mod_science_ship_survey_speed_9
			remove_modifier = custom_difficulty_MM_mod_science_ship_survey_speed_10
			remove_modifier = custom_difficulty_MM_mod_science_ship_survey_speed_11
			remove_modifier = custom_difficulty_MM_mod_science_ship_survey_speed_12
			remove_modifier = custom_difficulty_MM_mod_science_ship_survey_speed_13
			remove_modifier = custom_difficulty_MM_mod_science_ship_survey_speed_14
			remove_modifier = custom_difficulty_MM_mod_science_ship_survey_speed_15
			remove_modifier = custom_difficulty_MM_mod_science_ship_survey_speed_16
			remove_modifier = custom_difficulty_MM_mod_science_ship_survey_speed_17
			remove_modifier = custom_difficulty_MM_mod_science_ship_survey_speed_18
			remove_modifier = custom_difficulty_MM_mod_science_ship_survey_speed_19
			remove_modifier = custom_difficulty_MM_mod_science_ship_survey_speed_20
			if = {
				limit = {
					check_variable = { which = custom_difficulty_MM_mod_science_ship_survey_speed value = 0 }
				}
			}
			else_if = {
				limit = {
					check_variable = { which = custom_difficulty_MM_mod_science_ship_survey_speed value < -9.500 }
				}
				add_modifier = { modifier = custom_difficulty_MM_mod_science_ship_survey_speed_-10 days = -1 }
			}
			else_if = {
				limit = {
					check_variable = { which = custom_difficulty_MM_mod_science_ship_survey_speed value < -8.500 }
				}
				add_modifier = { modifier = custom_difficulty_MM_mod_science_ship_survey_speed_-9 days = -1 }
			}
			else_if = {
				limit = {
					check_variable = { which = custom_difficulty_MM_mod_science_ship_survey_speed value < -7.500 }
				}
				add_modifier = { modifier = custom_difficulty_MM_mod_science_ship_survey_speed_-8 days = -1 }
			}
			else_if = {
				limit = {
					check_variable = { which = custom_difficulty_MM_mod_science_ship_survey_speed value < -6.500 }
				}
				add_modifier = { modifier = custom_difficulty_MM_mod_science_ship_survey_speed_-7 days = -1 }
			}
			else_if = {
				limit = {
					check_variable = { which = custom_difficulty_MM_mod_science_ship_survey_speed value < -5.500 }
				}
				add_modifier = { modifier = custom_difficulty_MM_mod_science_ship_survey_speed_-6 days = -1 }
			}
			else_if = {
				limit = {
					check_variable = { which = custom_difficulty_MM_mod_science_ship_survey_speed value < -4.500 }
				}
				add_modifier = { modifier = custom_difficulty_MM_mod_science_ship_survey_speed_-5 days = -1 }
			}
			else_if = {
				limit = {
					check_variable = { which = custom_difficulty_MM_mod_science_ship_survey_speed value < -3.500 }
				}
				add_modifier = { modifier = custom_difficulty_MM_mod_science_ship_survey_speed_-4 days = -1 }
			}
			else_if = {
				limit = {
					check_variable = { which = custom_difficulty_MM_mod_science_ship_survey_speed value < -2.500 }
				}
				add_modifier = { modifier = custom_difficulty_MM_mod_science_ship_survey_speed_-3 days = -1 }
			}
			else_if = {
				limit = {
					check_variable = { which = custom_difficulty_MM_mod_science_ship_survey_speed value < -1.500 }
				}
				add_modifier = { modifier = custom_difficulty_MM_mod_science_ship_survey_speed_-2 days = -1 }
			}
			else_if = {
				limit = {
					check_variable = { which = custom_difficulty_MM_mod_science_ship_survey_speed value < -0.500 }
				}
				add_modifier = { modifier = custom_difficulty_MM_mod_science_ship_survey_speed_-1 days = -1 }
			}
			else_if = {
				limit = {
					check_variable = { which = custom_difficulty_MM_mod_science_ship_survey_speed value < 1.500 }
				}
				add_modifier = { modifier = custom_difficulty_MM_mod_science_ship_survey_speed_1 days = -1 }
			}
			else_if = {
				limit = {
					check_variable = { which = custom_difficulty_MM_mod_science_ship_survey_speed value < 2.500 }

country_event = {
	id = custom_difficulty_mm.21
	 #Player
	hide_window = yes
	is_triggered_only = yes
	immediate = {
		set_country_flag = custom_difficulty_mm_country_known
		event_target:custom_difficulty_MM_var_storage = {
			set_variable = { which = custom_difficulty_MM_mod_country_starbase_capacity_mult value = custom_difficulty_MM_mod_country_starbase_capacity_mult_Player }
			set_variable = { which = custom_difficulty_MM_mod_terraforming_cost_mult value = custom_difficulty_MM_mod_terraforming_cost_mult_Player }
			set_variable = { which = custom_difficulty_MM_mod_terraform_speed_mult value = custom_difficulty_MM_mod_terraform_speed_mult_Player }
			set_variable = { which = custom_difficulty_MM_mod_country_command_limit_mult value = custom_difficulty_MM_mod_country_command_limit_mult_Player }
			set_variable = { which = custom_difficulty_MM_mod_country_resettlement_cost_mult value = custom_difficulty_MM_mod_country_resettlement_cost_mult_Player }
			set_variable = { which = custom_difficulty_MM_mod_country_starbase_influence_cost_mult value = custom_difficulty_MM_mod_country_starbase_influence_cost_mult_Player }

					check_variable = { which = custom_difficulty_MM_mod_science_ship_survey_speed value = 0 }
				}
			}
			else_if = {
				limit = {
					check_variable = { which = custom_difficulty_MM_mod_science_ship_survey_speed value < -9.500 }
				}
				add_modifier = { modifier = custom_difficulty_MM_mod_science_ship_survey_speed_-10 days = -1 }
			}
			else_if = {
				limit = {
					check_variable = { which = custom_difficulty_MM_mod_science_ship_survey_speed value < -8.500 }
				}
				add_modifier = { modifier = custom_difficulty_MM_mod_science_ship_survey_speed_-9 days = -1 }
			}
			else_if = {
				limit = {
					check_variable = { which = custom_difficulty_MM_mod_science_ship_survey_speed value < -7.500 }
				}
				add_modifier = { modifier = custom_difficulty_MM_mod_science_ship_survey_speed_-8 days = -1 }
			}
			else_if = {
				limit = {
					check_variable = { which = custom_difficulty_MM_mod_science_ship_survey_speed value < -6.500 }
				}
				add_modifier = { modifier = custom_difficulty_MM_mod_science_ship_survey_speed_-7 days = -1 }
			}
			else_if = {
				limit = {
					check_variable = { which = custom_difficulty_MM_mod_science_ship_survey_speed value < -5.500 }
				}
				add_modifier = { modifier = custom_difficulty_MM_mod_science_ship_survey_speed_-6 days = -1 }
			}
			else_if = {
				limit = {
					check_variable = { which = custom_difficulty_MM_mod_science_ship_survey_speed value < -4.500 }
				}
				add_modifier = { modifier = custom_difficulty_MM_mod_science_ship_survey_speed_-5 days = -1 }
			}
			else_if = {
				limit = {
					check_variable = { which = custom_difficulty_MM_mod_science_ship_survey_speed value < -3.500 }
				}
				add_modifier = { modifier = custom_difficulty_MM_mod_science_ship_survey_speed_-4 days = -1 }
			}
			else_if = {
				limit = {
					check_variable = { which = custom_difficulty_MM_mod_science_ship_survey_speed value < -2.500 }
				}
				add_modifier = { modifier = custom_difficulty_MM_mod_science_ship_survey_speed_-3 days = -1 }
			}
			else_if = {
				limit = {
					check_variable = { which = custom_difficulty_MM_mod_science_ship_survey_speed value < -1.500 }
				}
				add_modifier = { modifier = custom_difficulty_MM_mod_science_ship_survey_speed_-2 days = -1 }
			}
			else_if = {
				limit = {
					check_variable = { which = custom_difficulty_MM_mod_science_ship_survey_speed value < -0.500 }
				}
				add_modifier = { modifier = custom_difficulty_MM_mod_science_ship_survey_speed_-1 days = -1 }
			}
			else_if = {
				limit = {
					check_variable = { which = custom_difficulty_MM_mod_science_ship_survey_speed value < 1.500 }
				}
				add_modifier = { modifier = custom_difficulty_MM_mod_science_ship_survey_speed_1 days = -1 }
			}
			else_if = {
				limit = {
					check_variable = { which = custom_difficulty_MM_mod_science_ship_survey_speed value < 2.500 }
				}
				add_modifier = { modifier = custom_difficulty_MM_mod_science_ship_survey_speed_2 days = -1 }
			}
			else_if = {
				limit = {
					check_variable = { which = custom_difficulty_MM_mod_science_ship_survey_speed value < 3.500 }
				}
				add_modifier = { modifier = custom_difficulty_MM_mod_science_ship_survey_speed_3 days = -1 }
			}
			else_if = {
				limit = {
					check_variable = { which = custom_difficulty_MM_mod_science_ship_survey_speed value < 4.500 }
				}
				add_modifier = { modifier = custom_difficulty_MM_mod_science_ship_survey_speed_4 days = -1 }
			}
			else_if = {
				limit = {
					check_variable = { which = custom_difficulty_MM_mod_science_ship_survey_speed value < 5.500 }
				}
				add_modifier = { modifier = custom_difficulty_MM_mod_science_ship_survey_speed_5 days = -1 }
			}
			else_if = {
				limit = {
					check_variable = { which = custom_difficulty_MM_mod_science_ship_survey_speed value < 6.500 }
				}
				add_modifier = { modifier = custom_difficulty_MM_mod_science_ship_survey_speed_6 days = -1 }
			}
			else_if = {
				limit = {
					check_variable = { which = custom_difficulty_MM_mod_science_ship_survey_speed value < 7.500 }
				}
				add_modifier = { modifier = custom_difficulty_MM_mod_science_ship_survey_speed_7 days = -1 }
			}
			else_if = {
				limit = {
					check_variable = { which = custom_difficulty_MM_mod_science_ship_survey_speed value < 8.500 }
				}
				add_modifier = { modifier = custom_difficulty_MM_mod_science_ship_survey_speed_8 days = -1 }
			}
			else_if = {
				limit = {
					check_variable = { which = custom_difficulty_MM_mod_science_ship_survey_speed value < 9.500 }
				}
				add_modifier = { modifier = custom_difficulty_MM_mod_science_ship_survey_speed_9 days = -1 }
			}
			else_if = {
				limit = {
					check_variable = { which = custom_difficulty_MM_mod_science_ship_survey_speed value < 10.500 }

				add_modifier = { modifier = custom_difficulty_MM_mod_science_ship_survey_speed_10 days = -1 }

				}
				add_modifier = { modifier = custom_difficulty_MM_mod_science_ship_survey_speed_11 days = -1 }
			}
			else_if = {
				limit = {
					check_variable = { which = custom_difficulty_MM_mod_science_ship_survey_speed value < 12.500 }
				}
				add_modifier = { modifier = custom_difficulty_MM_mod_science_ship_survey_speed_12 days = -1 }
			}
			else_if = {
				limit = {
					check_variable = { which = custom_difficulty_MM_mod_science_ship_survey_speed value < 13.500 }
				}
				add_modifier = { modifier = custom_difficulty_MM_mod_science_ship_survey_speed_13 days = -1 }
			}
			else_if = {
				limit = {

				}
				add_modifier = { modifier = custom_difficulty_MM_mod_science_ship_survey_speed_16 days = -1 }
			}
			else_if = {
				limit = {
					check_variable = { which = custom_difficulty_MM_mod_science_ship_survey_speed value < 17.500 }
				}
				add_modifier = { modifier = custom_difficulty_MM_mod_science_ship_survey_speed_17 days = -1 }
			}
			else_if = {
				limit = {
					check_variable = { which = custom_difficulty_MM_mod_science_ship_survey_speed value < 18.500 }
				}
				add_modifier = { modifier = custom_difficulty_MM_mod_science_ship_survey_speed_18 days = -1 }
			}
			else_if = {
				limit = {
					check_variable = { which = custom_difficulty_MM_mod_science_ship_survey_speed value < 19.500 }
				}
				add_modifier = { modifier = custom_difficulty_MM_mod_science_ship_survey_speed_19 days = -1 }
			}
			else_if = {
				limit = {
					check_variable = { which = custom_difficulty_MM_mod_science_ship_survey_speed value < 20.500 }
				}
				add_modifier = { modifier = custom_difficulty_MM_mod_science_ship_survey_speed_20 days = -1 }
			}
		}
	}
}
country_event = {
	id = custom_difficulty_mm.22
	 #update newly created countries without having to open menu
	hide_window = yes
	is_triggered_only = yes
	trigger = {
		NOT = { has_country_flag = custom_difficulty_mm_country_known }
		has_global_flag = custom_difficultyMM_active
	}
	immediate = {
		if = {
			limit = { is_ai = yes }
			country_event = { id = custom_difficulty_mm.20 }
		}
		else = { country_event = { id = custom_difficulty_mm.21 } }
	}
}
